attributes.title: Huge scam
attributes.review: If you download this app your phone, email, and address with be used to invade your privacy. I get trump emails at least 5 times a day and robocalls. Trump campaign is selling your info to advertisers. Oh yeah and let’s not forget Trump is a child predator.

attributes.title: I can not believe this...
attributes.review: An absolutely terrible app that was very threatening. It was not helpful in the slightest and it had a lot of glitches that brought me to random websites. Not to mention it kept asking for my credit card! I’m appalled at how this app treated me. Not ok!

attributes.title: DISGRACE TO AMERICA😡🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
attributes.review: as a full-blooded american🇺🇸nothing pains me more😰than to see our beautiful, gracious president ❤️ have an absolute horse-ass of an app like this🐴🤬it was like the brainwashed leftest developed this🖐🤨not to mention it tried to INVADE MY FREEDOM OF PRIVACY👿🦅made me question whether our dear president trump is actually a righteous republican or not😔

attributes.title: 🧚🏼✨ love the app ❤️🌸
attributes.review:
Everyone deserves human rights 💖✨🧚🏼🌸 not you tho🥰💖💫

You dropped your crown 💫💖💅🏽 let’s keep it there

God never makes mistakes✨except when he made you 💖💫❤️

This hits different 🤩🌸✨🧚🏼 in a domestic abuse type of way 😁🥰💖🧚🏼

attributes.title: Tremendously Garbage
attributes.review: This app is so garbage that when I first downloaded it I immediately felt the symptoms of Clovid 19. I would not recommend this app for anyone with underlining healthy conditions. When I finally deleted it I felt so much better!

attributes.title: Donald Trump is a true American President!🇺🇸
attributes.review: I downloaded the app. Not to scrutinize Mr. President like the Democrats would but instead to follow and support a true American President. 🇺🇸

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: One stop for ALL Trump info! Upcoming events with reminders, latest tweets, shop and donate!

attributes.title: Too much information
attributes.review: Why am I being asked for private information before going in to see the updates? It is bot worth it to lose my privacy.

attributes.title: Disappointed :(
attributes.review: Downloaded this app to keep up to date with Lord Trump and my fellow cult member—- I mean supporters, but when I opened it all I saw was a picture of Mike Pence in bdsm gear. It then proceeded to ask me my age, and when I entered 18, called me an old hag. Hoping there is an update soon.

attributes.title: Thought this would make me great again??
attributes.review: Instead it just made me even more racist and fall prey to a slow creep of fascism in the US :( but at least when he yells he probably spits a lot which I also do
attributes.userName: thank you thank you thank you
